Address.label: Address
Address.value: 974 CENTRE ROAD, WILMINGTON, Delaware, 19805, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Corteva was formed in 2019 as the agriculture division of the DowDuPont merger and subsequent separation. The company is a leader in the development of new seed and crop chemicals products. Seeds generate a little over half of total company profits and crop protection chemicals make up the remainder. Although Corteva operates globally, around half of revenue comes from North America.

value.name: Sam Eathington
value.title: Chief Technology, Digital Officer & Executive VP
